Finot, Jean, 1858-1922. Préjugé des races. English

Evans, Florence Wade
Finot, Jean, 1858-1922
mdRecord.dcterms:description: pt. I. The inequality of human beings.--pt. II. Towards the unity of the human type.--pt. III. Anthropo-psychology and anthropo-sociology.--pt. IV. The mysterious or uncertain origins of peoples and races.--pt. V. Are there peoples condemned to remain eternally inferior to others?
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Original dark blue cloth. Donation of Arthur Curtiss James.
